title: Earth is a battlefield
creator_credit: Dick Taylor, Geoffrey Sumner and W.M. Larkins Studio
brief_description: A light-hearted history of the contribution steel has made to world food supplies and the importance of exports made from steel in paying for imported food. Original animation techniques, with a good musical score and a commentary of rhyming couplets make for a delightful and useful film. Animation by Beryl Stevens and others
